name: Brutal Dinosaur
description:
Brutal Dinosaur is a game that mixes two styles of games, beat em up and shooter in a unique way.





The story is told like a comic book.







- 2 Playable characters with different techniques and special powers
- 8 Stages
- 5 Bosses
- Variety of enemies
- Unique gameplay that mixes the shotter and the Beat 'em up
- Mounts with which you can attack the enemy.
